name: Audacity Help File
summary: Learn about .HTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HTB files are stored in a .ZIP format. Therefore, you can rename their extension to ".zip" and decompress them with any ZIP decompression utility.

description: Help file used by Audacity, a free sound editing program; stores a compressed archive of Windows help files, .HTML files, and images; used for displaying help information when selecting Help â†’ Contents in Audacity.
